name: Deadlicious
description:
The Game

You play as a starving zombie "living" in a city. In order to survive you have to harvest humans. But in order to eat - eh - harvest them you have to kill first. But be careful: they will fight back.

Harvesting a human has some positive effects:

  1. It will heal you
  2. It will reset the starving bar
  3. It will give you points

So harvest as much as possible to raise your final score!

Starving System

If the starving bar runs out it will apply 1 damage-point to you. Also the starving rate will increase by a little. So you really want to avoid that the bar runs down to zero. 

As mentioned above: you can reset the starving bar by harvesting (eating) humans. But you also can affect the system in negative way. Attack and running will let you starve more!

Humans

There are 4 different types of humans. They have individual health, damage, attack-speed and points. You can easily distinct them by there model. 

If they are easy to kill then of course they give less points/health.

Hint: Friendly fire is ON. So humans can kill each other!

Controls

W/A/S/D (or arrow keys) - Move
E - Harvest (eat)
Shift - Run
Space - Attack

The game has an auto-aim-mechanic. So you only need to be close enough to an human. Hitting the attack-key will make you face the target before the actual attack triggers. 

Credits

Asset pack used in game: Simple apocalypse (Synty)
Background-Music in city from: joelsteudler.itch.io
